content.query:
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE ActivityLog
DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE srcActivityLog

-- CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD='P@ssword@123'

-- CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL sasToken
-- WITH IDENTITY='SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
-- SECRET='sv=2022-11-02&ss=b&srt=sco&sp=rlx&se=2024-07-26T21:41:21Z&st=2024-07-04T13:41:21Z&spr=https&sig=0PL4Qm%2BTbWnmVD1sOXpnObi%2FBK7OqBeMNBANy3TZDLQ%3D'

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE srcActivityLog
WITH(
    LOCATION='abfss://data@datalake4synapse.blob.core.windows.net',
    TYPE=HADOOP,
    CREDENTIAL=sasToken
)

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT parquetFileFormat
WITH(
    FORMAT_TYPE=PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION='org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
)

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ActivityLog
(
    [Correlationid] VARCHAR(200),
    [Operationname] VARCHAR(300),
    [Status] VARCHAR(100),
    [Eventcategory] VARCHAR(100),
    [Level] VARCHAR(100),
    [Time] VARCHAR(100),
    [Subscription] VARCHAR(200),
    [Eveninitiatedby] VARCHAR(1000),
    [Resourcetype] VARCHAR(300),
    [Resourcegroup] VARCHAR(1000),
    [Resource] VARCHAR(2000)
)
WITH 
(
    LOCATION='/ActivityLog-01.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE=srcActivityLog,
    FILE_FORMAT=parquetFileFormat
)

SELECT * FROM ActivityLog
